brand_color_description: Brand color for major navigational elements
brand_text_color_description: Brand color for hover and active states
text_color_description: Text color for body and heading elements
background_color_description: Background color of your Help Center
search_area_background_color_description: Background color of search area in your Help Center
favicon_description: Icon displayed in the address bar of your browser
homepage_background_image_description: Hero image on the home page
community_background_image_description: Hero image on the community topics page
community_image_description: Image for the community section on the home page
error_image_description: Image for the error page in the helpcenter
minimal_header_description: Change value to show minimal header
header_background_color_description: Update color to change background color of header
header_text_color_description: Update color to change header text color
minimal_footer_description: Change value to show minimal footer
footer_background_color_description: Update color to change background color of footer
footer_text_color_description: Update color to change color of footer text
welcome_message_description_label: Update text to update welcome message title
welcome_message_visibility_description: Select option to hide/show welcome message block
welcome_message_link_text_description: Update text to change the text of link in welcome message
welcome_message_link_description: Update url to change the url of link in welcome message
search_placeholder_text_description: Update text to change the placeholder text of search bar or type NONE to show default placeholder text
search_placeholder_text_dc_description: Add placeholder name for DC of your title here (e.g. from {{dc.title}}, add title only), or enter NONE (for no DC)
homepage_block_color_description: Change color to change the background color of homepage category and custom blocks
category_block_visibility_description: Update value to change the visibility of category blocks on homepage
custom_block_visibility_description: Update value to change the visibility of custom blocks on homepage
knowledge_base_visibility_description: Update value to change the visibility of knowledge base tree on homepage
knowledge_base_visibility_label: Show or Hide Knowledge Base Tree
block_title_dc_description: Add placeholder name for DC of your title here (e.g. from {{dc.title}}, add title only), or enter NONE (for no DC)
block_visibility_description: Update value to change the visibility of block
block_icon_description: Change to update icon of block
block_hover_icon_description: Change to update hover icon of block
block_font_icon_description: Enter font-awesome class name (e.g. fas fa-pencil-alt), or enter NONE
video_block_title_description: Update title to change the title of block
block_title_description: Update title to change the title of block or type HIDE_ME to change visibility of custom block
block_url_description: Update URL to change the redirection of block
block_text_description: Update description to change the description text of block
first_pop_video_title_description: Change text to change the title of first popular video block
first_pop_video_title_dc_description: Add placeholder name for DC of your first popular video title here (e.g. from {{dc.title}}, add title only), or enter NONE (for no DC)
first_pop_video_id_description: The ID is present in the youtube URl of the video,after the last equals-to sign.The URL and thumbnail will be generated from the ID
second_pop_video_title_description: Change text to change the title of second popular video block
second_pop_video_title_dc_description: Add placeholder name for DC of your second popular video title here (e.g. from {{dc.title}}, add title only), or enter NONE (for no DC)
second_pop_video_id_description: The ID is present in the youtube URl of the video,after the last equals-to sign.The URL and thumbnail will be generated from the ID
third_pop_video_title_description: Change text to change the title of third popular video block
third_pop_video_title_dc_description: Add placeholder name for DC of your third popular video title here (e.g. from {{dc.title}}, add title only), or enter NONE (for no DC)
third_pop_video_id_description: The ID is present in the youtube URl of the video,after the last equals-to sign.The URL and thumbnail will be generated from the ID
article_share_block_visibility_label: Show or Hide Social Share Icons
follow_article_description: Users can follow a specific article
googleplus_link_description: Add link of your google+ profile. To hide this link fill '#' in text box.
twitter_link_description: Add link of your twitter profile. To hide this link fill '#' in text box.
facebook_link_description: Add link of your facebook page. To hide this link fill '#' in text box.
youtube_link_description: Add link of your youtube channel. To hide this link fill '#' in text box.
linkedin_link_description: Add link of your linkedin profile. To hide this link fill '#' in text box.
pinterest_link_description: Add link of your pinterest profile. To hide this link fill '#' in text box.
instagram_link_description: Add link of your instagram profile. To hide this link fill '#' in text box.
email_link_description: Add your email. To hide this link fill '#' in text box.
search_sidebar_description: Show or Hide Search Page Sidebar
